price: He will be at the forefront of his people on the Day of Resurrection, leading them into the Fire. What a terrible place to be led to!
arabic: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyāmati fa-awradahumu al-nāra wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrūdu
